Art History.1: Identify and contextualize major works of art and architecture from pre-history to the present.
Art History.2: Demonstrate historical awareness through an understanding of world cultures and the evolution of a global civilization.
Art History.3: Understand the role of art in the development of society, including how art reflects social and cultural ideologies.
Art History.4: Comprehend the methodological approaches used in art history.
Art History.5: Engage in research and utilize available resources (archives, databases, etc.).
Art History.6: Write and speak clearly and convincingly in order to communicate original ideas and analyze text.
